Package net.tangly.ui.canvases

package net.tangly.ui.canvases
The API is similar to its client-side counterpart: 
@{code
 Canvas canvas = new Canvas(800, 500);
 CanvasRenderingContext2D ctx = canvas.getContext();

 // Draw a red line from point (10,10) to (100,100):
 ctx.setStrokeStyle("red");
 ctx.beginPath();
 ctx.moveTo(10, 10);
 ctx.lineTo(100, 100);
 ctx.closePath();
 ctx.stroke();
 }
  • Related Packages

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Canvas
    Canvas component that you can draw shapes and images on.
    CanvasRenderingContext2D
    The context for rendering shapes and images on a canvas.
